pages.text: Jetpack go brrr... The more powerful the fuel, the faster the jetpack! We recommend Rubber Boots and a Rubber Helmet...$(br2)Don't forget to activate it using the $(o)Toggle Flight$() keybinding!
This Mining Drill can finally replace your Pickaxes and Shovels. Fill it with powerful fuel for the best speed!$(br2)Toggle between Silk Touch and Fortune III with shift right-click.
